about_the_game:
CONTENT WARNING

This game contains mature themes, including death, suicide, abuse, and strong language, which some players may find unsettling.

PLOT

After a heated argument culminates in a sudden car crash, Amelia and her classmates are haunted by the fear that they may have run over someone. As they struggle to move past the incident, Amelia begins to experience disturbing nightmares that suggest a malevolent force is at play.

Torn between reality and their deepest fears, each of the five friends must unravel the truth behind the unsettling events, facing life-or-death situations that will force them to make life-altering decisions.

Who is orchestrating the horrifying events that unfold?

Will the friends uncover the identity of the person they hit?

As danger closes in, who will make it through and who will be lost?

FEATURES

♦ Professional Voice Acting: An immersive experience featuring a stellar cast, including Kennedy Durbin, Edward Lutz-Lay, Estelle Son, Adam New, Ciara Payne, and Hikaru Kanzaki, and more exceptional voice talents bringing supporting characters to life.

♦ Over 80,000 Words: Dive into a fresh tale packed with mystery, horror, and a touch of romance and drama.

♦ Choices DO matter: From pivotal moments that can alter relationships to choices that may lead characters toward life-or-death situations. Choose wisely!

♦ Multiple endings per chapter: Tracked through the in-game completion screen.

♦ Gallery and extra content: Explore an in-game gallery filled with stunning CG illustrations and unique features to enrich the main story.

♦ Five Unique Perspectives: Experience the depths of each main character through their own dedicated chapter. Discover their fears, desires, and quirks.

♦ Full controller support: Xbox & PlayStation compatible controllers, keyboard and mouse, and touch screen.

CREDITS

  • Casting & Voice Direction: Very Berry Studios, Phebe Fabacher

  • Script: Oscar Zapata

  • Character Art: Malva_mart, Eider Art

  • Backgrounds: みんちりえ

  • Music: Rafael Dzib Chérrez, Agustín Ruiz

  • Publishing: Mangotronics

highlighted.name: To Be, or Not to Be
Like a Needle in a Haystack
The Truth, and Nothing but the Truth
Starting Off on the Wrong Foot

content_descriptors.notes: There is a content warning at the beginning of the game. Some references in the text made to self-harm and abuse. Stylized blood appears on characters who are injured and on the pages of a book. Hanging, drowning, a car accident, electrocution, physical and verbal abuse are also are present.

short_description: The Devil's Whisper is a psychological horror Visual Novel with a full voice cast. Immerse yourself in a haunting mystery filled with dark drama and a touch of romance. Multiple thrilling alternate endings to play through! Choose who lives and who dies!
